description: Details required for Conditions 4 (Fire Safety Strategy), 7 (Boundary Treatment) and 8 (Landscaping and Planting Scheme) of planning permission 23/02998/HOU (Demolition of an existing shed, single garage and rear extension, erection of two storey front, rear and single storey side extension. Hip to gable roof extension with 3nos front dormer, rear dormer and balcony. Erection of a single storey rear outbuilding double garage, front boundary with pillars, railings and gates. Formation of drop kerb, new pedestrian and vehicular access. Fenestration alteration.)
application_type_full: Approval of details reserved by a condition (discharge)

constraints_details.constraints_layer_description: AAS Name: Kingston Hill - Designated in UDP 1998
NEIPOL Name: MC1  Maldens and Coombe

AIRCZ Type:: Heathrow Planning Consultation Zone: All buildings, structures, erections and works exceeding 90 metres in height (295.3 feet)Contact: The Safeguarding Department, Heathrow Airport Limited, c/o Planning Services, First Point, Buckingham Gate, Gatwick Airport, West Sussex, RH6 0NT

decision_conditions: The submitted details show an inconsistent design and layout in comparison to the plans approved under planning permission 23/02998/HOU. As such, Officers have not been able to assess the compliance of the proposal in accordance with Policy DM10 (Design Requirements for New Developments including House Extensions) of the LDF Core Strategy Adopted April 2012.
